definitions.definition: The intense white light produced when heating lime in an oxyhydrogen flame.
A type of stage lighting once used in theatres and music halls , producing a bright light by the use of incandescent quicklime .
Attention , notice , a starring or central role , present fame ; spotlight .

main_definition: The intense white light produced when heating lime in an oxyhydrogen flame.
secondary_definitions: A type of stage lighting once used in theatres and music halls , producing a bright light by the use of incandescent quicklime .
( by extension ) Attention , notice , a starring or central role , present fame ; spotlight .
